quote: Evangelicals believe they are saved by grace through faith but then add a man-made waiver that you have to work as hard as you can can meet middle-class behavioral patterns to hang onto it.
quote_letters: EVANGELICALS BELIEVE THEY ARE SAVED BY GRACE THROUGH FAITH BUT THEN ADD A MAN-MADE WAIVER THAT YOU HAVE TO WORK AS HARD AS YOU CAN CAN MEET MIDDLE-CLASS BEHAVIORAL PATTERNS TO HANG ONTO IT
